Articles.Content:
Hello, can I help you guys in making textures or sth?

Head on to the development page if you want to help and join the project =)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46643-Kerbin-City-Community-Project-phase-A-and-B

Could you please provide the download in .zip format, I can't open .rar files!!! Also, no one tell me to get 7zip, I'm on a Mac!!!

Use WinRAR then. I found it for mac.

http://www.techspot.com/downloads/5169-winrar-for-mac.html

It works

Edited August 29, 2013 by Darndello
Whops misspelled something.

Just a thought, and I have no Idea if it could be implemented, but would it be possible for some of the bridges to be underpasses, especially the one to the airport, as that would look pretty neat if you ask me

Just a thought, and I have no Idea if it could be implemented, but would it be possible for some of the bridges to be underpasses, especially the one to the airport, as that would look pretty neat if you ask me

We were planning to add it to the bridge

As soon as I can I will download this,look very cool!

Can you upload the file in another format than .rar(like .zip or non-compressed)?

I can't de-compress it

Thank you in advance!

Edited September 2, 2013 by goldenpeach

You should get yourselves a software for doing .rar, .zip and other files.

I would reccomend jZip, it's free and very easy to use
Get Keka: http://www.kekaosx.com/en/ It is easy and great to use, i have a mac to and use the all the time.
Will the roads be available for a seperate download? i'd like to put a road network on the Mun.

How do we open the kertown menu?

EDIT:nevermind,I didn't find the menu because I didn't put the good folder in the gamedata folder.

Edited September 2, 2013 by goldenpeach
I know someone above me posted it, but a .zip would be nice! Not every mac user has admin access to install 7zip, and we can't unzip .rars! So a .zip would be awesome, since everyone can use them!
Oh freak! Gonna make some OP land vehicle, and break out my Kethane/lazor/miner hover craft. That sucker goes 263.7 m/s tops when it has all 3 engines fired!

From the pictures I've seen it looks very cool ,But I have no programs to open the .rar file and I have no idea how to use it . Could you put Kerbin City in the way most mods are put, like WayLand tower?

From the pictures I've seen it looks very cool ,But I have no programs to open the .rar file and I have no idea how to use it . Could you put Kerbin City in the way most mods are put, like WayLand tower?

http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

Totally free and works with .zip files too!

http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

Totally free and works with .zip files too!

Thankyou:)

i have a problem when i load up ksp with kerbin city istalled, the terrain fails to load, i just see the atmosphere.

i got kerbal town working.
if i could do it i would make a highway from KSC to the city with maybe just a few back roads connecting the different buildings together in KSC, other than that its awesome cant wait for more
Wakey wakey, new post, sorry, had to post something, this thread is so quiet compared to the other one.
Wish I could put my modeling skills to work here but I really don't have the time to pound one of these out with school and other mod stuff, etc.
kerrrbiinnnn citttyyy neeedssss annnnn upppppdaaatttteeee!

kerrrbiinnnn citttyyy neeedssss annnnn upppppdaaatttteeee!

nothke is just back, he's working on it
can you realease a download not using .rar and using .zip?
Please just release the next build! It's already more or less ready for release, just get it out already!

All my textures go missing when i load in something with this in. the planet is still there in the map view, but out of map view, there is nothing except my stock plane on the runway. Mods: DYJMisc, Extraplanetary launchpads, Firespitter, Hubs, Kerbin City, Kethane, KineTechAnimation, KSPX, Mechjeb2, MP_Nazari, Novapunch, Orbital Construction, RBI, RollKage, Tracks, TSAS, TV Areospace, Wayland Rover wheels and FL-1.

All my textures go missing when i load in something with this in. the planet is still there in the map view, but out of map view, there is nothing except my stock plane on the runway. Mods: DYJMisc, Extraplanetary launchpads, Firespitter, Hubs, Kerbin City, Kethane, KineTechAnimation, KSPX, Mechjeb2, MP_Nazari, Novapunch, Orbital Construction, RBI, RollKage, Tracks, TSAS, TV Areospace, Wayland Rover wheels and FL-1.

You have a lot of mods installed. I guess it's a memory problem. We will try to reduce the material count and generally optimize the City in one of the next builds.

You have a lot of mods installed. I guess it's a memory problem. We will try to reduce the material count and generally optimize the City in one of the next builds.

Wait... do you think THAT is many mods? You should have seen what I used before version 0.22.
